mapper.select: SELECT userNm, scholarshipNm, state, applied_at, reason FROM application ORDER BY applied_at DESC
SELECT userNm, scholarshipNm, state, applied_at, reason FROM application WHERE userNm = #{userNm} ORDER BY applied_at DESC
SELECT userNm, scholarshipNm, state, applied_at, reason FROM application WHERE scholarshipNm = #{scholarshipNm} ORDER BY applied_at DESC

SELECT a.userNm, a.scholarshipNm, s.scholarship_name, u.userName as user_name, d.Deptname as department_name, c.name as college_name, univ.univName as university_name, a.state, a.applied_at, a.reason FROM application a JOIN scholarship s ON a.scholarshipNm = s.id LEFT JOIN users u ON a.userNm = u.userNm LEFT JOIN department d ON u.deptNm = d.deptNm AND u.collegeNm = d.collegeNm AND u.univNm = d.univNm LEFT JOIN college c ON d.collegeNm = c.collegeNm AND d.univNm = c.univNm LEFT JOIN university univ ON u.univNm = univ.univNm WHERE a.userNm = #{userNm} AND a.scholarshipNm = #{scholarshipNm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application (userNm, scholarshipNm, state, applied_at, reason) VALUES (#{userNm}, #{scholarshipNm}, #{state}, #{appliedAt}, #{reason})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM application WHERE userNm = #{userNm} AND scholarshipNm = #{scholarshipNm}
